vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
RealOldFuckMaker.makeOldFucks has external calls inside a loop:
	- fuck.call(bytes4(sha3()(giveBlockReward()))) (0xf2570186500a46986f3139f65afedc2afe4f445d.sol#9)

vulnerability_findings.name: deprecated-standards
vulnerability_findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected @ 0xf2570186500a46986f3139f65afedc2afe4f445d.sol#9:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in 0xf2570186500a46986f3139f65afedc2afe4f445d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (0xf2570186500a46986f3139f65afedc2afe4f445d.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
